content.query:
select top 10 * 
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.parquet', 
    format = 'parquet') as rows

select top 10 * 
from openrowset(
    bulk 'https://azuredatalakegen2fur.dfs.core.windows.net/azuredlfilesystemfur/dbo.TripData.parquet',
    format = 'parquet') as rows
